sentences.en: Death holds no terrors for (= does not frighten ) me.
He cowered in the corner, gibbering with terror.
sentences.cn: 他蜷缩在角落里，吓得语无伦次。

sentences.en: Her eyes were transfixed with terror.
sentences.cn: 她被吓呆了，双眼直瞪着。

sentences.en: His complex anger flamed afresh , and Ruth was in terror of him.
sentences.cn: 他的无名火又冒上来了, 罗丝见他真害怕.

sentences.en: His report was scathing about Loyalist and Republican terror groups.
sentences.cn: 他的报告猛烈抨击了忠英派和共和军的恐怖组织。

sentences.en: His son is a real terror.
His terror was so great that he could do nothing.
sentences.cn: 他惊恐万分,以致什么事情也不能做了.

sentences.en: Numb with terror, she stared at the departing maraud-ers.
sentences.cn: 她吓得呆若木鸡，眼睁睁地看着劫匪们离去。

sentences.en: Sue screamed, not loudly, more in surprise than terror.
sentences.cn: 休尖叫起来，声音不大，吃惊多于恐惧。

sentences.en: That guy is a proper terror.

sentences.cn: 雅各宾派恐怖统治时期

sentences.en: The resistance movement started a campaign of terror .
sentences.cn: 抵抗情绪造成恐怖事件接连发生。

sentences.en: The shouts changed to screams of terror.
sentences.cn: 喊叫声变成了惊恐的尖叫声。
他们的脸因恐惧而吓得发白.

sentences.en: There was a look of sheer terror (= complete terror ) on his face.
sentences.cn: 他脸上的表情异常惊恐。

sentences.en: Those rebels are a terror to the entire town.
sentences.cn: 那些反叛者使全城的人感到恐惧.

sentences.en: We were in mortal terror of being found out.

trans.tran_cn: 恐怖，恐怖的缘由，恐怖行为，令人讨厌的人
